text: Ogedegbe is a Nigerian surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Best Ogedegbe (1954-2009), Nigerian football goalkeeper * Gbenga Ogedegbe, Nigerian American doctor * Ogedegbe of Ilesa (1822-1910), Yoruba chief and fighter in Yorubaland Category:Nigerian people Category:Surnames
title: Ogedegbe (surname)
